areyouhappy.message: Are you happy about 右拐?

descolor.message: Change the background color of the toolbar

descontextmenu.message: Show the context menu to open the current web page in the sidebar

description.message: Effortlessly open any website in your web browser's sidebar – streamline your workflow instantly!

desdefaultzoom.message: Default zoom level for all web pages

desdragdrop.message: Drag and drop your link or text here

desdropshadow.message: Get a shadow effect below the toolbar

desgooglesidepanel.message: Side panel view mode for Google search results

deshoverbackground.message: Change the background color when you mouse is over a link

deshovertextcolor.message: Change the font color when you mouse is over a link

deslasttime.message: When closing the sidebar, it will save the current URL. Upon reopening the sidebar, the last accessed URL will be loaded automatically

desopencopy.message: Show the button to copy the current page URL to the clipboard

desopentab.message: Show the button on the navigation bar to open the current page in a new tab

despassword.message: Lock your notes with a pasword

desquickbookmarks.message: Show the button to open your selected bookmark in the sidebar

desratebad.message: Sorry you have had this bad experience. Please let us know on how we can improve our extension for you.

desratebadtitle.message: How can we make it better?

desrategood.message: Happy to hear that you love 右拐! Will you take a moment to rate us in the browser extension store? Your browser extension store reviews make a difference!

desratetitle.message: Do you love this browser extension?

desrememberpage.message: If this option is enabled, it will not show you the reminder page

desremrate.message: If you like 右拐™, please do not hesitate to rate this extension to five stars now. This gives us courage to continue to maintain and improve this product for you. Writing a review is recommended, but not mandatory. If you do not have the time to write a review, you can rate it anonymously. It is important to give it ★★★★★. Thank you!

destapstar.message: Tap a star to rate it on the browser extension store.

desyoutube.message: Discover and learn more about Stefan's browser extension. Watch it now on YouTube.

deszoom.message: Show the floating zoom panel featuring zoom in, and zoom out buttons to manage the scale of the web page.

donatepromotext.message: If you can make a donation of any amount, I'd appreciate it immensely!

donatetext.message: Due to the very small number of donations the project may be closed. Please support further development with a Donation.

enjoyshare.message: Enjoy this extension and share it with others who you think will appreciate it.

head2.message: Choose your favorite 右拐 icon:

longdonatetext.message: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!

pagetitle.message: Open current web page in sidebar

permissionactivetab.message: This will only manage the 右拐 of the web page on the currently open tab page.

permissionbookmarks.message: This is to show the user bookmarks in the bookmark button.

permissioncontextmenu.message: This to add all the 右拐 item in the web browser context menu.

permissionhostaccess.message: This is to load any website into the side panel.

permissionoption.message: Permission must be enabled to use this feature.

permissionscripting.message: This is to inject JavaScript and CSS code into websites.

permissionsidepanel.message: This is to show the side panel in the web browser.

permissionstorage.message: This to save the settings on your local computer, and to sync it to your web browser account.

permissiontabs.message: This is needed for the following features: to show you the welcome and guide page, manage the 右拐 on all the open tabs, and to open the Options page.

promotext.message: Want to use something new and amazing for your web browser? Try the $product$ Browser extension.

ratedes.message: And let everyone know about this great extension!

sharetextc.message: The Best and Amazing 右拐 browser extension

sharetextd.message: 右拐' browser extension is the Best Useful Tool. Download it and try it yourself!

showremember.message: Do not show this reminder page again when I open the options page

skipremember.message: Skip this, and open now the options page

titelsyncbrowser.message: Sync the extension settings with your other browser.
